entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:34 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
